workflow_runs.name: CodeQL Security Analysis
workflow_runs.display_title: fix: BUG-16 bookmarks + BUG-23 E2E JWT + G-18 runbook + offline-first + PWA + CI

head_commit.message:
fix(web): stub scrollIntoView in WordCommentPanel test for jsdom compatibility

jsdom does not implement HTMLElement.scrollIntoView — stub it per test suite
to prevent TypeError when the focused card effect fires in tests.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

head_repository.description: GraphQL Federation Learning Platform - 6 Subgraphs + pgvector + Single Docker Container

workflow_runs.name: Full Test Suite
workflow_runs.display_title: fix: BUG-16 bookmarks + BUG-23 E2E JWT + G-18 runbook + offline-first + PWA + CI

head_commit.message:
feat(web): Word-style document annotation UI — 5 components + 5 tests + router wiring

- DocumentAnnotationPage: full-screen A4 layout with resizable document/comment panels
- AnnotatedDocumentViewer: ProseMirror DecorationSet plugin with layer-colored highlights
- WordCommentPanel: layer filter tabs, annotation count, Add button, auto-scroll to focused
- CommentCard: author avatar, layer badge, relative timestamp, focus ring
- CommentForm: floating dialog with Ctrl+Enter/Escape shortcuts, layer dropdown
- SelectionCommentButton: floating button positioned above text selection
- DocumentAnnotationPage.toolbar: zoom controls (75/100/125/150%) + back navigation
- AnnotatedRichDocumentViewer: standalone TipTap viewer alternative
- DocumentAnnotationPanel: simple annotation list component
- RichDocumentPage: updated with DocumentToolbar + zoom store integration
- router.tsx: /document/:contentId now uses DocumentAnnotationPage
- editor.css: annotation highlight CSS (per-layer colors + focused state)
- docs/plans/word-style-annotations.md: implementation plan

All 22 existing annotation tests pass. Zero TypeScript errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

workflow_runs.display_title: fix: BUG-16 bookmarks + BUG-23 E2E JWT + G-18 runbook + offline-first + PWA + CI

head_commit.message:
fix(web): fix AnnotationDecorationsPlugin test mocks to use constructable functions

Plugin and PluginKey are used with `new` in production code — arrow function
mocks throw when constructed. Replace with vi.fn(function(){...}) so the
mock is a constructable function with correct `this` binding.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

workflow_runs.name: GraphQL Federation Validation
workflow_runs.display_title: fix: BUG-16 bookmarks + BUG-23 E2E JWT + G-18 runbook + offline-first + PWA + CI

head_commit.message:
feat(web): resizable annotation panel + text-range decorations + lint fixes

- Add react-resizable-panels@4.6.5 + shadcn/ui ResizablePanel component
- Add useDocumentUIStore (zoom + panel width, persisted to localStorage)
- Add TextRange type to annotations.ts + textRange field to Annotation
- Add AnnotationDecorationsPlugin (ProseMirror inline decorations per layer)
- Fix ESLint disable-comment positions in pii-scrubber.ts
- Fix crm.service.spec.ts: replace Function type with precise callable signature
- Remove redundant eslint-disable comment in SourceManager.tsx devMutationFn
- Add .prettierignore excluding audit-export.yml (bare colons in YAML block scalar)
- Add .tmp-*.cjs to .gitignore; delete all stale temp API scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

workflow_runs.name: .github/workflows/audit-export.yml
workflow_runs.display_title: feat(web): resizable annotation panel + text-range decorations + lint…

head_commit.message:
feat(web): resizable annotation panel + text-range decorations + lint fixes

- Add react-resizable-panels@4.6.5 + shadcn/ui ResizablePanel component
- Add useDocumentUIStore (zoom + panel width, persisted to localStorage)
- Add TextRange type to annotations.ts + textRange field to Annotation
- Add AnnotationDecorationsPlugin (ProseMirror inline decorations per layer)
- Fix ESLint disable-comment positions in pii-scrubber.ts
- Fix crm.service.spec.ts: replace Function type with precise callable signature
- Remove redundant eslint-disable comment in SourceManager.tsx devMutationFn
- Add .prettierignore excluding audit-export.yml (bare colons in YAML block scalar)
- Add .tmp-*.cjs to .gitignore; delete all stale temp API scripts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

repository.name: EduSphere

head_repository.name: EduSphere
head_repository.description: GraphQL Federation Learning Platform - 6 Subgraphs + pgvector + Single Docker Container

workflow_runs.name: Continuous Integration
workflow_runs.display_title: fix: BUG-16 bookmarks + BUG-23 E2E JWT + G-18 runbook + offline-first + PWA + CI

head_commit.message:
fix(ci): pin pnpm@10.30.1, lowercase Docker image names, fix CodeQL HTML injection

- Pin PNPM_VERSION=10.30.1 in docker-build.yml to match pnpm-lock.yaml
  generation version, preventing --frozen-lockfile failures in all Docker builds
- Add 'Lowercase image prefix' step to build-images and build-multiarch jobs
  to convert TalWayn72 → talwayn72 (Docker requires all-lowercase image names)
- Remove <→< and >→> entity conversions in document-parser.service.ts
  URL parser to fix CodeQL HTML injection finding (angle brackets were being
  reintroduced after HTML tag stripping)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
